background: A firm produces multiple goods using different raw materials. Each good requires certain amounts of the raw materials and generates specific revenue.

parameters.definition: Number of different goods produced by the firm
Number of different raw materials used by the firm
Available amount of each raw material
Requirement of material j for producing one unit of good i
Revenue earned from selling one unit of good j

constraints.description: The quantity of each raw material used cannot exceed the available amount
The quantity of goods produced should not exceed the raw materials available

variables.definition: Quantity of good i produced by the firm

objective.description: Maximize the total revenue from goods production
objective.code:
# Set objective
model.setObjective(gp.quicksum(GoodsProduced[i] * Prices[i] for i in range(M)), gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
